Gold.en: The user's type is made resistant.

Silver.en: The user's type is made resistant.

Crystal.en: The user's type is made resistant.

Ruby.en: Makes the user resistant to the last attack’s type.
Ruby.de: Anwender wird resistent gegen letzten Angr.-Typ.

FireRed.en: The user changes type to make itself resistant to the last attack it took.
FireRed.de: Anwender ändert Elementklasse, um resistenter zu sein.
